message.entry: Too many colors; increasing tolerance to {0}
RGB2IND(RGB) is a deprecated syntax.\nSpecify number of colors, tolerance, or colormap.
RGB image has to be M-by-N-by-3 array.
Colormap, Number of colors, or Tolerance have to be non-negative.
Number of colors in the colormap has to be a non-negative integer.
Input colormap has to be a 2D array with at least 2 rows and exactly 3 columns.
All colormap intensities must be between 0 and 1.
Dither option has to be a character vector.
